markdownRemark.html: This is the second post in a series about what I learnt in my GPU class at NYU this past fall. This will be mostly about warps, why using warps from a SIMD hardware standpoint, and how warps can be a dangerous thing to deal with.

frontmatter.title:
What I Learnt About The CUDA Parallel Programming Model - 3.               
 More On Thread Divergence
What I Learnt About The CUDA Parallel Programming Model - 2. Warps
